## VertexData.getVertexBufferInfo() method

Gets the vertex buffer information by specific vertex semantic

**Signature:**

```typescript
getVertexBufferInfo(semantic: VertexSemantic): VertexBufferInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  semantic | [VertexSemantic](doc/markdown/./device.vertexsemantic.md) | The vertex semantic |

**Returns:**

[VertexBufferInfo](doc/markdown/./device.vertexbufferinfo.md)

Vertex buffer information of the given semantic
